618320.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Cardstock Cowboys: Weird West #1 (Token Pack)
618320.description:
Cardstock Cowboys: Weird West #1

Starter Pack Token Pack
Add a third dimension to your Weird West game with over 200 Cardstock Cowboys!
These heroes, scoundrels, and horrors are perfect for use with the Deadlands roleplaying
game and the Boomtowns! accessory, or our completely free miniatures rules, High
Noon--available on our Weird
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy
Grounds II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear
in your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre
and product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your
game. Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75
and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your
needs.
This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

  • Blessed (4)
  • Brave (4)
  • Confederate Officer (1)
  • Confederate Soldier (1)
  • Cowboy (1)
  • Cowgirl (1)
  • Gambler (2)
  • Gunslinger (4)

  • Kid (2)
  • Law Dog (4)
  • Mad Scientist (4)
  • Man-in-Black (2)
  • Muckraker (4)
  • Pony Express Rider (2)

  • Shaman (4)

Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Clemens G Meyer
Ruleset Compatibility: Any
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Clemens Meyer
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
